mapper.insert: insert into comment_info ( bno, memberId, commentCreatedTime, commentContents, pcno,commentModifiedTime) values (#{bno},#{memberId},now(),#{commentContents},#{pcno},now())
mapper.select: select cno,bno,memberID,commentCreatedTime,commentContents,pcno,commentModifiedTime from comment_info where bno =#{bno} order by commentCreatedTime asc, cno asc
select count(*) from comment_info where bno = #{bno}
mapper.delete: delete from comment_info where cno =#{cno} and memberId =#{memberId}
